tool_description:
HTTP Post end point taking base64 image and returning face recognition metadata.

API will return a unique Face ID per person - Providing the ability to track users accross different and multiple images.
name: Face Recognition
title: Face Recognition

api_list.name: face-rec
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://face-recognition17.p.rapidapi.com/facerec"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "face-recognition17.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://face-recognition17.p.rapidapi.com/facerec"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "face-recognition17.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
